course.subject: FINA
course.name: Advanced Derivative Applications
course.description: The course will cover practical applications of derivative pricing and hedging, focusing on equity-linked structures.  The emphasis of the course will be on building intuition with regard to option pricing and hedging, using Excel-based pricing models and real world applications.  A solid foundation in option pricing theory as provided by the prerequisite courses is assumed, as is familiarity with Excel and VBA.
